MetadataResource - Class in dev
The metadata resource represents the metadata on a particular device which is put by another machine to synchronize the metadata.

Construct a new resource.
MetadataUpdater - Class in dev
The event handler which updates the metadata with the remote machine whenever the updater or devices signals a change event.
